codeSystems.name: EvalStatusVS
codeSystems.title: Evaluation Status Value Set
codeSystems.description: Value Set for the status of the result of an evaluation.

codeSystems.name: ImmunizationProceduresCpt
codeSystems.title: Immunization-Relevant Procedures (CPT)
codeSystems.description: CPT codes for procedures relevant to immunization decision support, including splenectomy and cochlear implant.

codeSystems.name: IntervalReasonVS
codeSystems.title: Interval Reason
codeSystems.description: This value set includes codes for the reason an interval is considered to be invalid.

codeSystems.name: PreferredAllowedReasonVS
codeSystems.title: Reasons why certain doses are Preferred or Allowed doses
codeSystems.description: Reasons why certain doses are Preferred or Allowed doses

codeSystems.name: ImmunizationProceduresSnomed
codeSystems.title: Procedures
codeSystems.description: Comprehensive Value Set for medical procedures based on SNOMED CT codes.

codeSystems.name: VaccineConditionCodesIcd10
codeSystems.title: Vaccine Condition Codes (ICD-10-CM)
codeSystems.description: Value set for conditions based on ICD-10-CM that may impact immunization decisions, mapped to CDSi observation codes.

codeSystems.name: VaccineConditionCodesSnomed
codeSystems.title: Vaccine Condition Codes
codeSystems.description: Value set for conditions based on SNOMED CT, that may impact immunization.

codeSystems.name: VaccineGenderVS
codeSystems.title: Vaccine Gender
codeSystems.description: Value set for gender categories relevant to vaccination data.

codeSystems.name: VaccineLabEvidenceOfImmunityLoinc
codeSystems.title: Lab Evidence of Immunity (LOINC)
codeSystems.description: LOINC codes for laboratory tests that provide evidence of immunity, mapped to CDSi observation codes for immunization decision support.

codeSystems.name: VaccineMedicationCodesRxnorm
codeSystems.title: Immunization-Relevant Medications (RxNorm)
codeSystems.description: RxNorm codes for medications relevant to immunization decision support, including antivirals and aspirin.

codeSystems.name: VaccineMedicationCodesSnomed
codeSystems.title: Medications
codeSystems.description: Value set for medications and substances based on SNOMED CT, including both active ingredients and marketed products.

codeSystems.name: ValidAgeReasonVS
codeSystems.title: Valid Age Reason
codeSystems.description: Value set for reasons why a patient's age is considered valid/invalid for a vaccine.
